name: Xponential Fitness, Inc.
description: Xponential Fitness, Inc. is a leading boutique fitness franchisor that specializes in a variety of fitness modalities, offering a diverse array of workout experiences to meet the growing demand for personalized fitness solutions. Founded in 2017 and based in Irvine, California, Xponential Fitness operates several well-known brands, including Club Pilates, StretchLab, and AKT, among others. The company aims to empower individuals to lead healthier lifestyles through community-based fitness experiences that cater to various preferences and fitness levels. With a focus on innovative class formats and high-quality instruction, Xponential Fitness is committed to providing an exceptional member experience. The company has seen rapid growth, expanding its franchise network across the United States and internationally. In addition to its core fitness offerings, Xponential Fitness leverages technology to enhance member engagement and retention, including proprietary apps and tools that facilitate personalized fitness journeys. As the fitness industry evolves, Xponential Fitness continues to innovate and adapt, positioning itself as a leader in the booming boutique fitness segment. The company’s mission is to make boutique fitness accessible to everyone, creating a welcoming environment for all fitness enthusiasts.
